DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness global postural reeducation relative segmental exercise treatment scapular dyskinesis cervicalgia .
DOC.brief_title: Global Postural Reeducation Segmental Exercises Patients With Scapular Dyskinesis Cervicalgia
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To assess effectiveness global postural reeducation relative segmental exercise treatment scapular dyskinesis cervicalgia . Methods : Participants scapular dyskinesis cervicalgia ( n = 30 ) age 18 65 year randomly assign one two group : Global Postural Reeducation Segmental Exercises ( stretch strengthen ) . Upper extremity assess use Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) questionnaire . Function neck estimate use Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) . Pain severity measure use Visual Analogical Scale . Health-related quality life ( HRQoL ) assess use Short Form ( SF ) -12 . Assessments conduct baseline 10 weekly session ( 60 minute ) . Significance level establish 5 % .
DOC.criteria: Scapular Dyskinesis per SICK Scapula Rating Scale Chronic Cervicalgia ( pain least three month ) Cervical Stenosis Myelopathy Prolapsed InterVertebral Disk ( confirm magnetic resonance imaging ) , Winged Scapula due lesion long thoracic nerve spinal accessory nerve , ( document electromyography )
